DOC.brief_summary: During project effect 3 different bran-based dietary platform fermentation readily fermentable substrate investigate use stable isotope technique .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Different Bran-based Dietary Platforms Colon Metabolism Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Aged 18 65 year BMI 18 27 kg/m² Stable eating pattern ( 3 meals/day least 5 days/week ) Use antibiotic month precede study Abdominal surgery ( except appendectomy ) Use medication affect gastrointestinal tract last 2 week prior study include spasmolytic , antidiarrhoea medication , anticonstipation medication Use pre probiotic supplement month precede study Chronic gastrointestinal disease , inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis ) , irritable bowel disease… Pregnancy lactation Blood donation last 3 month Abnormal Hblevel ( Standard range 14 18 g/dL men 12 16 g/dL woman ) Participation clinical study involve radiation exposure past year
